One of the techniques I played with a couple years ago was using lazers. I =
made a box with a=A0pulse modulated lazer transmitter and photoelectric rec=
eiver. I could either transmit ambient room noise (hoping for evp), or any =
signal I can run through=A0a 9mm connection. The clarity was phenomenal but=
 the timing was out of step. I would get loooonnnnggg speech with long tone=
s. I think the frequency of the lazer light was too high, which kept it out=
 of sync with whatever level I was talking to at the time. I vowed to use a=
 green or blue lazer (shorter wavelength) to see if it helped but they are =
pricey so it was put on hold.
=A0
Frank R.
